title: Coca-Cola Happiness Factory font
content:
Hello happy people,

I'm working with a font that's delivered to us (don't know the source). It's called "A2 Happiness Bold" and it looks like:http://users.pandora.be/xinavane/hffont.png (more on coke.be)

It doesn't have a lot of extra characters included, so I was wondering if this font were based on some other font. An 'original' which could include more characters and wheights.

thanks

author: xinavane

comments.content: It might be based on Renault SH ( [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/renault-sh/roman/](http://web.archive.org/web/20110304172142/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/renault-sh/roman/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/renault-sh/roman/")).
The Renault font is designed by [Wolff Olins](http://web.archive.org/web/20110304172142/http:/www.wolffolins.com/), an advertising bureau. Perhaps they have a connection to the Coca-Cola campagin.
It does have a lot of similarities. I thank you.
